message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know if you're interested.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the consideration. However, I am only willing to pay up to $850,000 for the product. Please let me know if this is within your range.

Bob, I understand your position.  While I value your interest, $850,000 is still below my minimum. I'm willing to come down to $900,000 to make this deal work. This is a significant compromise on my part, and I believe it reflects the value of the product for you.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the reduction. However, I am still unable to meet you at $900,000. I am willing to pay up to $875,000 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
